attributes.action: make it a criminal offence for Government to misspend taxpayers money.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is very easy to spend someone else's money and for the last ten years because the economy has been strong, the Government has found it very easy to spend taxpayer's money. Had this been their own money it is very unlikely that they would have built the Dome, the Scottish Parliament, the awning at the House of Commons, organised the failed regional assembly elections, all of which wasted millions of pounds. Making such misspending a criminal offence might make Government behave more seriously with our money.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
